item.description:
A reservation has been made, so please be 99.9% sure you can make it if you reply yes. I need to give the restaurant a final headcount by Friday, January 25th. Late-comers and no-shows are a no-no! Please understand that we have a reservation. Please bring cash to pay for your dinner.

Check out Avila's website for menu, directions, etc ...

http://www.avilaresta....

Consider taking public transportation if you don't want to deal with parking, etc ... The two closest T stops are Boylston, which is the Green Line or Chinatown, which is the Orange Line.

http://www.mbta.com/.....

Maybe we can do something after dinner? Any suggestions? Please put them on the message board because I do check it almost daily.

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: The reservation is under my name and my cell phone # is 617-999-9094.
item.why: Enjoy a modern Mediterranean dinner with other separated or divorced people.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: "A" Restaurant Night
